text: @SenSchumer When the country should be coming together you’re tearing in apart. Blame yourself because they were telling people to  go  to China town  New York is it so great they wouldn’t catch the coronavirus go out to China town go out to https://t.co/kGbAX6KXTb need to be voted out quick
